sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-row class="info" :gutter="24">
        <el-col :span="24" style="margin-top:20px">
            <el-card>
                <el-form ref="form" :model="form" label-width="80px">
                    <el-form-item label="帖子名称">
                        <el-input v-model="form.name"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="所属板块">
                        <el-select v-model="form.region" placeholder="请选择活动区域">
                            <el-option label="计算机系" value="computer"></el-option>
                            <el-option label="数学系" value="math"></el-option>
                        </el-select>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="开启匿名">
                        <el-switch v-model="form.hidden"></el-switch>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="帖子标签">
                        <el-checkbox-group v-model="form.type">
                            <el-checkbox label="匿名" name="type"></el-checkbox>
                        </el-checkbox-group>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item label="活动形式">
                        <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.content"></el-input>
                    </el-form-item>
                    <el-form-item>
                        <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit">发表</el-button>
                        <el-button @click="comeBack">返回</el-button>
                    </el-form-item>
                </el-form>
            </el-card>
        </el-col>
    </el-row>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "viewHomePage",
        data() {
            return {
                form: {
                name: '',
                region: '',
                hidden: false,
                type: [],
                resource: '',
                content: ''
                }
            }
        },
        methods: {
            handleSelect(key, keyPath) {
                console.log(key, keyPath);
            },
            clickMenu(item){
                this.$router.push({
                    name:item.name,
                    activeIndex:item.path
                })
            }
        }
    }
</script>
